title: The Steelers' Struggles Continue in Third Consecutive Loss and Best Wagers in Week 16
description:
On a special holiday episode, Warren Sharp and Joe House recap the Steelers' loss to the Bengals and attempt to make sense of the New England Patriots. Later, they look at some of the best bets in Week 16.
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
